|brand = Netgear |model = WNDR4000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/23/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Netgear_WNDR4000 |wlclass = AN750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY310400144 |icid = 4054A-10400144 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4718A1;BCM4718A1KFBG, CS1116 P11, 132814 N1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 480 <!-- 480/ 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6445E; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = 7995392
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6JB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = 64
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 20:4E:7F, 20:E5:2A, 4C:60:DE, A0:21:B7, C4:3D:C7, E0:46:9A, E0:91:F5 |oui = 20:4E:7F, 20:E5:2A, 4C:60:DE, A0:21:B7, C4:3D:C7, E0:46:9A, E0:91:F5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2528L;SiGe, 2528L, 110BK;2; ,,, 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2594L;SiGe, SE2594L, 247EN;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H181 |manuf_rev = T00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, Tomato (Hyzoom)
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/03/2011 |estreldate = 02/27/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 606449077629 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004PA2B6C |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 223 x 153 x 31 mm (8.8 x 6.0 x 1.2 in) |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, Internal |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331;BCM4331KMLG, TE1038 P21, 999195 3 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, Internal |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The manual states the default SSIDs are ''NETGEAR'' (b/g/n radio) and ''NETGEAR-5G'' :(a/n radio).. but ''NETGEARXX'' and ''NETGEARXX-5G'' may instead be used.
"U12H181T00" and "REV. 1 GP" is silkscreened on the main [http://img-fotki.yandex.ru/get/6726/20776875.3/0_f8bbf_8ac41534_orig.jpg board]. :OEM: [[Foxconn]] U12H181T00
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Netgear_WNDR4000 On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wndr4000 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31474-netgear-wndr4000-n750-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''Netgear WNDR4000'' Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :C4:3D:C7 OUI
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=90474 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=90600 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums]
===Third party firmware support=== This device should be well supported by '''DD-WRT''' (see wiki + forum posts below) :and partially supported by '''OpenWrt''' <small>([http://downloads.openwrt.org/barrier_breaker/14.07/brcm47xx/mips74k/openwrt-wndr4000-squashfs.chk Barrier Breaker (14.07) build])</small>.
While there is an '''OpenWrt''' build available, b43 currently lacks 11n support.
There is also support from [http://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/tomato-hyzoom-bwq518-releases.70364/ Tomato Hyzoom]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== [https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Netgear_WNDR4000 On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki]
Supported by dd-wrt as of = K26 build 17201 20110614
Please insert instructions here
